title: OCE account in China
body: so I'm going to china and I was wondering if I can play league on my Oce account and how much ping would I be playing on? thanks guys.

replies.body:
If you are playing FROM china TO OCE, you will get around 130-170Ping
If your going to play on a Chinese server from China, you will have lower ping depending on the one of 70+ servers you chose.
If you want to play on chinese server with your OCE account, you will need to find a way to transfer it.
Most likely you will need to create a Chinese account because the Chinese version of the game is a whole different version compared to main version of the game.
